events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back on the incorrect product received.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request concerning the incorrect shipment.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and I have attached a photo showing the item that was sent instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. I’ve initiated the refund process, and you should receive the money back in your account within 5 business days.
Thank you for the quick help! I appreciate how fast you started the refund process.
The refund case is now resolved, and everything should be completed on our end. Please feel free to contact us if further assistance is needed.
Just following up to make sure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
As you confirmed receipt of the refund, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
